modName: HDT Breast And Butt Physics - TBBP BBP Supported
summary: Bored of the standard animation (no offense) mods that gives you no bounce ? Try this advanced physics extension for your beautiful characters sake.
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://imgur.com/MPsInlu][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MPsInlu.png[/IMG][/URL]

What this mod does is to provide new physics called HDT to the body mods you guys use. It is way better than the other animation mods that gives you bounce in my opinion.

[URL=http://imgur.com/F1wdhLT][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/F1wdhLT.png[/IMG][/URL]

[youtube]Jh8-Pv8-ek8[/youtube]

[youtube]LwYEw0e1lmA[/youtube]

[youtube]GBUznGsSJ1U[/youtube]

[youtube]YFC3gdU3tTg[/youtube]

[URL=http://imgur.com/iwahbpL][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iwahbpL.png[/IMG][/URL]

---> SKSE 1.6.16 (Google it!)
or higher

---> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?] HDT Physics Extension 14.28 [/url]
or higher

---> XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended (Google it!)

---> A TBBP or BBP supported body mod

(SeveNBase TBBP or CBBEAdvancedTBBP are my preferences.)

[URL=http://imgur.com/IM6LSGO][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IM6LSGO.png[/IMG][/URL]

---> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29827/? ] I Love Cleavage CBBE HDT [/url]

---> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53396/? ] Sexy idle Animation [/url]

---> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50301/?] Sexy Transparent Zipsuit[/url]

---> Havok Object (Google it!)

--->[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?] Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and TBBP HDT[/url]
[URL=http://imgur.com/9BG5Ms6][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9BG5Ms6.png[/IMG][/URL]

---> HydrogensaysHDT

---> TheBoneRanger

---> threedeedevil
